public interface zeta.session.TextEditor

(source file: TextEditor.pizza)
java.lang.Object
   |
   +----zeta.session.TextEditor
The pure class interface. 
public interface TextEditor
An interface to be implemented by plugins which connect to a text editor.

Version: $Id: TextEditor.pizza,v 1.1 2000/05/15 07:43:52 wg Exp $

add(TextVisit)
Add the given visit intention
close(File, boolean)
Close editing the given file.
commit()
Commit the recently scheduled commands
getButtonName()
Return a button name for this editor
open(File)
Open the given file for editing.
reopen(File)
Reopen this file for editing
reset()
Reset the added and committed visiting intentions.
save(File, boolean)
Save the given file.
saveRelated()
Save all related files.
unlock(File)
Release any file-system locks on this file
visit(TextVisit)
Visit the given locator

getButtonName
public abstract String getButtonName();
Return a button name for this editor. If the returned name is prefixed with @, the remaining name is interpreted as a file to be found in $ZETABASE/lib/images

commit

public abstract void commit()
  throws IOException;
Commit the recently scheduled commands. It is expected that issued commands are silently accumulated by the editor adaptor (without throwing any errors) and are then executed in sequence when commit is called.

add

public abstract void add(TextVisit cap);
Add the given visit intention. This may create a mark in the remote editor.

visit

public abstract void visit(TextVisit cap);
Visit the given locator. It is guaranteed that the locator has been added before.

reset

public abstract void reset();
Reset the added and committed visiting intentions.

open

public abstract void open(File file);
Open the given file for editing.

unlock

public abstract void unlock(File file);
Release any file-system locks on this file. Prepares the modification of the file from the outside. A reopen is called when the writing has finished. Unlock on a file which has never been opened should have no effect.

reopen

public abstract void reopen(File file);
Reopen this file for editing. Reopening a file which has not yet been openeded should behave as initial open.

close

public abstract void close(File file,
                           boolean dontSave);
Close editing the given file.

save

public abstract void save(File file,
                          boolean silently);
Save the given file.

saveRelated

public abstract void saveRelated();
Save all related files.
